rukus.text: O you who believe ! when you meet a group (of enemies) then be firm and remember God much that you may be successful
And obey God and His messenger and do not dispute lest you become weak hearted and your strength departs, and be patient, God is certainly with those who are patient
And do not be like those who came out of their houses boastfully and to be seen by people and (who) turn away (people) from the way of God, and God is the Encompasser of what they do

And when the devil made their deeds fair seeming to them and said, "No human being can overcome you this day and I am certainly your protector." But when the two groups came in sight of each other he turned upon his heels saying, " I am free of you, I see that which you do not see, I certainly fear God, and God is severe in requiting (evil)
